content:
(Verse 1)
We gathered in the dark, our friendship on the line
A tale of lies and secrets, so hard to define
The flicker of the silver screen, casting shadows on our hearts
We never thought our world would tear apart

(Pre-chorus)
In the dim-lit theater, our trust began to fray
We searched for truth in whispers, as dreams began to sway

(Chorus)
Flickering trust, under the marquee light
We fought to hold on, through that fateful night
Together we stood, our bonds put to the test
With flickering trust, we conquered the rest

(Verse 2)
The lies unfolded, our hearts aching from the strain
We stood our ground, determined to ease the pain
Through the echoes of betrayal, a resolution came to be
We found our strength in unity

(Pre-chorus)
In the dim-lit theater, our trust began to fray
We searched for truth in whispers, as dreams began to sway

(Chorus)
Flickering trust, under the marquee light
We fought to hold on, through that fateful night
Together we stood, our bonds put to the test
With flickering trust, we conquered the rest

(Bridge)
We've weathered the storm, embraced the change
Together we rise, no challenge too strange
Our friendship, a beacon shining so bright
Illuminating the darkness, guiding us through the night

(Chorus)
Flickering trust, under the marquee light
We fought to hold on, through that fateful night
Together we stood, our bonds put to the test
With flickering trust, we conquered the rest

(Outro)
As the curtain falls and the credits roll,
Our journey goes on, our story untold
With flickering trust, we found our way
Forever united, we're here to stay
